==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ばん|りょく|そう|ちゅう|こう|いち|てん|k6=いっ|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From a line in ''Ode to a Pomegranate Tree'' (咏石榴詩) by [[w:Wang Anshi|Wang Anshi]]: 万緑叢中紅一点、動人春色不須多.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|/banryoku soːchuːkoː itteɴ/|lang=ja}}

===Idiom===
{{ja-pos|ばんりょくそうちゅう こういってん|idiom}}

# a beautiful single red flower that blooms within a field of trees and grass
# something unique that stands out among many other things
# a single woman among many men
